ygData.subject: Re: exp gain
ygData.msgSnippet: Not that I m implying you re wrong (personally I have no clue) but I m curious what your source is for these figures... Thanks Slyde of Xegony ... From: Jannus
ygData.messageBody:
Not that I'm implying you're wrong (personally I have no clue) but I'm
curious what your source is for these figures...

Thanks

Slyde of Xegony


----- Original Message -----
From: Jannus Malus <jannus_@...>
To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 14, 1999 11:35 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] exp gain


> From: "Jannus Malus" <jannus_@...>
>
> The XP Penalties/bonuses break down as follow:
>
> Human gets a 20% XP bonus over other races - all other races (Warrior
class
> to avoid class penalty) gain xp at the same rate (unless one of the
> following applies)
>
> Hybrids take a 20% xp penalty
>
> XP giving kills in a "dungeon" zone give a 25% xp bonus
>
> So a human pali would level at the exact same rate as a Dwarvish warrior.
>
